message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I think the product is a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you think the product is pricey, but I have to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm not quite ready to go that low yet. I'm willing to compromise at $105. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll pay $100 for the product.
I'm not sure I want to give up any more ground, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $105 again, just like in Round 5. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one more attempt. I'll pay $102 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any lower than I already offered, Bob. I think $105 is a great price for this product, and I'm not going to compromise further. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
